subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Delmon Young, traded by the Twins in August, has become a consistent run producer as the Tigers’ No. 3 hitter and finds himself on the verge of eliminating the Yankees.
snippet: Delmon Young, traded by the Twins in August, has become a consistent run producer as the Tigers’ No. 3 hitter and finds himself on the verge of eliminating the Yankees.
